item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:98 Chances: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 7.3% in the afternoon session after major indices rose, with the S&P 500 up 0.8% while the Nasdaq gained 1.2%, as the Federal Open Market Committee left the policy rate unchanged at 5.
